list_translation_mean.translate_mean: áo dài kéo lết dưới đất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark or a series of signs or objects left behind by the passage of someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a trail of blood on the grass

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long thin part or line stretching behind or hanging down from something.
a beaten path through rough country such as a forest or moor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công viên quốc gia với những con đường mòn thiên nhiên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the rear end of a gun carriage, resting or sliding on the ground when the gun is unlimbered.
short for trailer (sense 2 of the noun).
draw or be drawn along the ground or other surface behind someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Alex trailed a hand through the clear water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Alex kéo một tay qua nước sạch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: walk or move slowly or wearily.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she trailed behind, whimpering at intervals
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đi sau, thút thít trong khoảng thời gian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: follow (a person or animal), typically by using marks, signs, or scent left behind.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Sam suspected they were trailing him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sam nghi ngờ họ đang theo dõi anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be losing to an opponent in a game or contest.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Packers were trailing 10–6 at halftime
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các nhà đóng gói đã kéo dài 10-6 vào giờ nghỉ giải lao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: advertise (something, especially a film or program) in advance by broadcasting extracts or details.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bank's plans have been extensively trailed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kế hoạch của Ngân hàng đã được kéo dài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: apply (slip) through a nozzle or spout to decorate ceramic ware.
